price: 21. Jų Viešpats suteikia jiems geras naujienas apie Savo Gailestingumą ir Jo buvimą patenkintu (jais), ir apie Sodus (Rojų) jiems, kuriuose amžini malonumai.
arabic: يُبَشِّرُهُمۡ رَبُّهُم بِرَحۡمَةٖ مِّنۡهُ وَرِضۡوَٰنٖ وَجَنَّٰتٖ لَّهُمۡ فِيهَا نَعِيمٞ مُّقِيمٌ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yubashiruhum rabbuhum biraḥmatin min'hu wariḍ'wānin wajannātin lahum fīhā naʿīmun muqīmun
translations: Their Lord gives them glad tidings
Their Lord gives them glad tidings
